message: Ren is wagging his tail with my bag in his mouth.
I take my bag from Ren, put him inside, and dash out of the room toward the front door.
Once outside, I catch sight of his large frame amid a growing crowd of people.
What an asshole! I hurry to catch up.
After a while, Mink turns down a narrow side road.
There are fewer people around, and quite a few signs for shady clubs and bars.
So Platinum Jail has these places too...
